title: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 842/95 of 18 April 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 1900/94 setting the intervention threshold for apples for the 1994/95 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 842/95 of 18 April 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 1900/94 setting the intervention threshold for apples for the 1994/95 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The figure of '257 800 tonnes` referred to in Article 1 of Regulation (EC) No 1900/94 is hereby replaced by '260 000 tonnes`.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 April 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 118, 29. 4. 1989, p. 21.
(2) OJ No L 180, 1. 7. 1992, p. 23.
(3) OJ No L 194, 29. 7. 1994, p. 14.
